skillTree.localised_description: Harkon's personal mount is a dreadful thing indeed - a Terrorgheist with a piercing, banshee-like shriek that has the power to stun any who hear it.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can fire while on the move.
This unit is Undead (does not rout, immune to terror, becomes unstable when Leadership is low).

skillTree.localised_description: "It's a rabbit's foot. A rabbit. No… Oh never mind - it brings me luck. It does! Trust me!"
You'd better kill this one or they'll keep coming back until one of you is dead. Even then, there's no guarantee it'll be over!
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

skillTree.localised_description: Harkon's personality has been broken into many parts, the end result of his insatiable lust for power.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Some seafarers appear to have been born for the role.

skillTree.localised_description: The magical backlash Harkon suffered whilst trying to increase his power left him cut off from the Winds of Magic forever.
By which death is expertly dealt, assuming it doesn't blow your hand off in the process!

effects.description: "Explosive Bullets" ammunition (projectiles will cause explosive damage)

Missile strength: +8% for Zombie Pirate Gunnery Mob and Rotting Prometheans Gunnery Mob units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Sometimes, by chance it seems, the disparate threads are drawn together. Gods help you when they are.
His crimes are without number and his villainy without end… behold the Pirate King!
To look upon this Undead Lord is to witness true and absolute horror!

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: "They'll never know the difference, even up close."

effects.description:
Income from all enemy buildings: -5%
	(local enemy province)

skillTree.localised_description: If there's duty to be paid, rest assured that this one will find a way around it.
The beasts of the world belong to everyone, never a single individual.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +2 for Zombie Pirate Gunnery Mob units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Fire, to destroy all that you have done; fire, to end all you've become.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +8% for Carronade, Mortar and Queen Bess units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Yes, they’re from the east. Annoying, yet useful - their hides, particularly…"
If there's swash to be buckled, this one will be right at the front, in the thick of the fray.
Strike hard, strike true.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
There is something to be said for whipping the foe into a frenzy before the fight is joined.
"Dark Magic might be effective, but there's no substitute for a good blade in your hands."
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The strength and agility of the Vampire comes from a place beyond: the supernatural realm of the Unliving.
"Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"
You have to watch this one - when you shake their hand, count your fingers afterwards.
There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Bone, muscle and sinew cannot always be relied upon to hold together unassisted.

skillTree.localised_description: "Now listen up an' listen good… here be the plan…"
Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
They could not break free, even if they wanted to.
Cursed to haunt the waves forever, never finding rest or solace.
If it's not tacked down, this one'll 'ave it and kill anyone who gets in their way.

skillTree.localised_description: Such things keep the eternal players' of this world alive.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit can fire while on the move.
This unit is Undead (does not rout, immune to terror, becomes unstable when Leadership is low).

trait.localised_description: Paranoia, although a sign of madness, doesn't mean they aren't all out to get you and you shouldn’t kill them first.

related_attributes.bullet_text: When this unit gets hurt it may go on a rampage against nearby enemy units, attacking the closest one and ignoring any orders given.
When this unit gets hurt it may go on a rampage against nearby enemy units, attacking the closest one and ignoring any orders given.

factionEffects.localised_description: Luthor Harkon never chose to come to the New World, but fate decided that he must conquer this exotic land of the dead. Lustria conceals ancient secrets and great power. Harkon’s lust will not be sated until his Zombie army rules this land from coast to coast!

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +60 with Followers of Nagash

Melee defence: +6 for Lords and embedded Heroes
	(all armies)

items.colour_text: It is well known that Lustrian gold is enchanted with all manner of esoteric properties; Harkon thinks it will restore his fractured mind!

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Luthor Harkon has made many great cold-blooded enemies in his time, but his Undead army fear - and feel - nothing.

effects.description:
Leadership: +8 when fighting against Lizardmen
	(Lord's army)
